message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. While I appreciate your offer, I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a price of $12000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you, and it's still a great deal compared to what you could find elsewhere.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective, but I am still unable to meet at $13500. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12500 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000, but I think that's the lowest I can go. This is a one-time offer, so I'd like to make it clear that I'm not willing to negotiate further.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I am still unable to meet at $13000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12800 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $13000, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal. This is my final offer.
